org.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM issues INNER JOIN projects ON projects.id = issues.project_id WHERE projects.status <> 9 AND (SELECT 1 AS one FROM enabled_modules AS em WHERE em.project_id = projects.id AND em.name = 'issue_tracking') IS NOT NULL AND issues.author_id = "$1"

rewrites.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM issues INNER JOIN projects ON projects.id = issues.project_id WHERE projects.status <> 9 AND (SELECT 1 AS one FROM enabled_modules AS em WHERE em.project_id = projects.id AND em.name = 'issue_tracking' LIMIT 1) IS NOT NULL AND issues.author_id = "$1"
